summary: The House of Medici was a powerful Italian family that started as bankers and became political leaders in Florence. They began in the 15th century and ruled for many years, even becoming popes and queens. The Medici Bank was huge, making them very rich. They used their money to support artists like Michelangelo and build famous places like Saint Peter's Basilica. The family was important in the Renaissance, helping art and science flourish. Even though they had ups and downs, the Medici's impact on history is still remembered today.
title: House of Medici
